00020 
00021 
00022 template<typename T1>
00023 arma_inline
00024 const Op<T1, op_mean>
00025 mean(const Base<typename T1::elem_type,T1>& X, const u32 dim = 0)
00026   {
00027   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00028   
00029   return Op<T1, op_mean>(X.get_ref(), dim, 0);
00030   }
00031 
00032 
00033 
00034 //! Immediate 'find the mean value of a row vector' operation
00035 template<typename eT>
00036 inline
00037 eT
00038 mean(const Row<eT>& A)
00039   {
00040   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00041   
00042   arma_debug_check( (A.n_elem == 0), "mean(): given vector has no elements" );
00043   
00044   return op_mean::direct_mean(A.mem, A.n_elem);
00045   }
00046 
00047 
00048 
00049 //! Immediate 'find the mean value of a column vector' operation
00050 template<typename eT>
00051 inline
00052 eT
00053 mean(const Col<eT>& A)
00054   {
00055   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00056   
00057   arma_debug_check( (A.n_elem == 0), "mean(): given vector has no elements" );
00058   
00059   return op_mean::direct_mean(A.mem, A.n_elem);
00060   }
00061 
00062 
00063 
00064 //! \brief
00065 //! Immediate 'find mean value' operation,
00066 //! invoked, for example, by: mean(mean(A))
00067 template<typename T1>
00068 inline
00069 typename T1::elem_type
00070 mean(const Op<T1, op_mean>& in)
00071   {
00072   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00073   arma_extra_debug_print("mean(): two consecutive mean() calls detected");
00074   
00075   typedef typename T1::elem_type eT;
00076   
00077   const unwrap<T1> tmp1(in.m);
00078   const Mat<eT>& X = tmp1.M;
00079   
00080   arma_debug_check( (X.n_elem == 0), "mean(): given matrix has no elements" );
00081   
00082   return op_mean::direct_mean(X.mem, X.n_elem);
00083   }
00084 
00085 
00086 
00087 template<typename T1>
00088 arma_inline
00089 const Op< Op<T1, op_mean>, op_mean>
00090 mean(const Op<T1, op_mean>& in, const u32 dim)
00091   {
00092   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00093   
00094   return Op< Op<T1, op_mean>, op_mean>(in, dim, 0);
00095   }

00126 
00127 template<typename eT>
00128 inline
00129 eT
00130 mean(const Op<subview<eT>, op_mean>& in)
00131   {
00132   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00133   arma_extra_debug_print("mean(): two consecutive mean() calls detected");
00134   
00135   const subview<eT>& X = in.m;
00136   
00137   arma_debug_check( (X.n_elem == 0), "mean(): given matrix has no elements" );
00138   
00139   return op_mean::direct_mean(X);
00140   }
